title: A Recital of faith
brief_description: In 1940 R.S. Reynolds and his metals company were concerned at the low volume of US aluminium production. They decided to produce enough to make 50,000 planes. A new plant was built the same year and was in operation only five months later. The manufacturing processes of making aluminium is shown in detail.
